statements: SELECT * FROM sales_metrics ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_amount FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_amount > 10000
SELECT sales_date, salesperson_name, sales_amount FROM sales_metrics WHERE salesperson_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT DISTINCT salesperson_name FROM sales_metrics
SELECT * FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_amount FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_amount > 1000 AND salesperson_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT salesperson_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_metrics GROUP BY salesperson_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT salesperson_name, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_date > '2022-01-15' GROUP BY salesperson_name HAVING avg_sales > 500;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT salesperson_name) AS num_salespeople, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales_amount FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, team_member_name, sales_volume, sales_region FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT team_member_name, sales_region, sales_volume, id FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT sales_volume, team_member_name, id, sales_region FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT * FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT team_member_name, sales_volume FROM sales_team_performance;
SELECT team_member_name, sales_volume FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales_region='North'
SELECT id, team_member_name, sales_volume FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales_volume > 5000 ORDER BY team_member_name DESC

SELECT team_member_name, calls_made, emails_sent FROM sales_team_performance JOIN performance_metrics ON sales_team_performance.id = performance_metrics.team_member_id WHERE calls_made > 50 AND emails_sent > 20
SELECT team_member_name, sales_volume FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales_region='East' OR sales_region='West' ORDER BY sales_volume DESC
SELECT SUM(sales_volume) AS total_sales FROM sales_team_performance WHERE sales_region='South'
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT employee_name, sales_performance FROM sales_team ORDER BY sales_performance DESC;
SELECT employee_name, sales_target FROM sales_team WHERE sales_target > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_history WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT metric_name, actual_value FROM sales_metrics WHERE actual_value < target_value;
SELECT * FROM sales_team ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, sales_target FROM sales_team WHERE sales_performance > 0.8;
SELECT s.employee_name, m.metric_name, h.sale_amount FROM sales_team s JOIN sales_metrics m ON s.sales_target = m.target_value JOIN sales_history h ON s.employee_id = h.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, sales_target, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_team JOIN sales_history ON sales_team.employee_id = sales_history.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name, sales_target;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics
SELECT team_name, revenue FROM SalesTeamPerformance
SELECT member_name, role FROM SalesTeamMembers WHERE team_id = 1
SELECT metric_name, variance FROM SalesMetrics ORDER BY variance DESC
SELECT review_date, feedback FROM PerformanceReview
SELECT * FROM SalesTeamPerformance ORDER BY revenue DESC, sales_count ASC
SELECT team_name, sales_count, revenue FROM SalesTeamPerformance WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY sales_count DESC
SELECT team_name, sales_count, revenue FROM SalesTeamPerformance WHERE revenue > 5000 AND sales_count < 50
SELECT team_id, team_name, SUM(sales_count) AS total_sales FROM SalesTeamPerformance GROUP BY team_id, team_name
SELECT m.team_name, COUNT(r.review_id) AS review_count FROM SalesTeamMembers m LEFT JOIN PerformanceReview r ON m.member_id = r.member_id GROUP BY m.team_name ORDER BY review_count DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT team_id, team_name, total_sales_amount FROM sales_team WHERE total_sales_amount > 10000;
SELECT team_leader, team_name, average_sales_amount FROM sales_team ORDER BY average_sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting' AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_leader, total_sales_amount FROM sales_team WHERE team_name LIKE 'Sales%';

SELECT team_name, team_leader, total_sales_amount
FROM sales_team
WHERE total_sales_amount > 5000
ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC

SELECT * FROM sales_metrics
WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
ORDER BY actual_value DESC

SELECT team_name, team_leader, activity_type, activity_date
FROM sales_team
JOIN sales_activity ON sales_team.team_id = sales_activity.team_id
WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting'
ORDER BY activity_date ASC

SELECT team_name, target_amount, target_date
FROM sales_team
JOIN sales_targets ON sales_team.team_id = sales_targets.team_id
WHERE target_date >= '2023-01-01'
ORDER BY target_amount DESC

SELECT team_name, performance_metric, performance_value, performance_date
FROM sales_team
JOIN sales_performance ON sales_team.team_id = sales_performance.team_id
WHERE performance_date = '2022-12-31'
ORDER BY performance_value DESC
